borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p><span style="-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; color: rgb(36, 36, 36); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, system-ui, &quot;Apple Color Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Web&quot;, sans-serif; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit;">The boundary treatment shown in drawing no.19/094/003 Revision B,<span style="-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; color: rgb(36, 36, 36); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, system-ui, &quot;Apple Color Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Web&quot;, sans-serif; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit;">shall be&nbsp;</span><span style="-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; color: rgb(36, 36, 36); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, system-ui, &quot;Apple Color Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Web&quot;, sans-serif; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit;">retained for the lifetime of the development. </span></p><p><span style="-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; color: rgb(36, 36, 36); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, system-ui, &quot;Apple Color Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Web&quot;, sans-serif; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit;">Reason:<span style="-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; color: rgb(36, 36, 36); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, system-ui, &quot;Apple Color Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Web&quot;, sans-serif; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit;">To protect or enhance the character and amenity of the area in accordance</span><br></p>
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse.

The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:

- DRAWING XXX REV XX DATED XX
- USE [SHIFT]+[ENTER] FOR REGULAR LINE SPACING
- USE [ENTER] FOR LARGER LINE SPACING

No other drawings or documents apply.
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Construction of a single storey rear and side extension.
